## SAO class

The Scalable Ambient Obscurance (SAO) post effect

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class SAO extends AbstractPostEffect 
```
**Extends:** [AbstractPostEffect](doc/markdown/./scene.abstractposteffect.md)
